data.name: Z3TA+ 2 - Cakewalk Mutant R3LOAD Pack
data.detailed_description: EDM producer Encanti (Ben Cantil) is back with nearly 200 new Mutant presets... AND THIS TIME IT'S PERSONAL! Cakewalk Mutant R3LOAD is a suite of 197 all new sounds for Z3TA+ 2 from Encanti's personal arsenal of sounds crafted while teaching synthesis at Berklee Valencia and during production of his upcoming record. If you like the sounds from the previous Mutant packs, Mutant R3LOAD is a must buy!
data.about_the_game: EDM producer Encanti (Ben Cantil) is back with nearly 200 new Mutant presets... AND THIS TIME IT'S PERSONAL! Cakewalk Mutant R3LOAD is a suite of 197 all new sounds for Z3TA+ 2 from Encanti's personal arsenal of sounds crafted while teaching synthesis at Berklee Valencia and during production of his upcoming record. If you like the sounds from the previous Mutant packs, Mutant R3LOAD is a must buy!
data.short_description: EDM producer Encanti (Ben Cantil) is back with nearly 200 new Mutant presets... AND THIS TIME IT'S PERSONAL! Cakewalk Mutant R3LOAD is a suite of 197 all new sounds for Z3TA+ 2 from Encanti's personal arsenal of sounds crafted while teaching synthesis at Berklee Valencia and during production of his upcoming record.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista 32-bit/64-bit (SP2), Windows 7 32-bit/64-bit (SP1), Windows 8 32-bit/64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or newer processor
  • Graphics: 1280x800 minimum resolution, 32-bit
  • Sound Card: ASIO compatible hardware is recommended
  • Additional Notes: Expansion Pack for Z3TA+ 2. Requires Z3TA+ 2 which is available separately

data.legal_notice: *A valid E-mail is required for registering the application and obtaining Cakewalk technical support.
